title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 27mm f/2.8
text: It's a photo of my hallway, but I'm surprisingly happy with it. It's quite interesting and makes me want to experiment more with making "scenes" like this in mundane places.

title: Google Pixel 8 Pro
